title: Facebook adds new AI features, animated profile photos, and backgrounds for text posts
description: Facebook's new AI features let users animate their profile pics, restyle their Stories and Memories, and add  backgrounds to text posts.
content: Facebook's new AI features let users animate their profile pics, restyle their Stories and Memories, and add  backgrounds to text posts.
